textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Made in the USA since 1977, Hanky Panky began as a set of handmade lingerie crafted from embroidered handkerchiefs and became a trend-setting label with the introduction of the Original Rise Thong in the 1980s. New York-based friends and co-founders Gale Epstein and Lida Orzeck continue to influence the industry today with their unique blend of traditional and glam and the high-quality, comfortable materials that make Hanky Panky the go-to garments for women around the world. See all Hanky Panky reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
